description:
Convert media files in a flash

Convert media files in a flash
- High-speed conversion of video, audio, and image files
- 180+ formats: MP4, MOV, AVI, DVD, VOB, MKV, MP3, and more
- Basic video editing: trim, crop, rotate, adjust colors and sound
- Batch processing, lossless compression, and AI video upscaling
- Fixed an issue with DVD conversion, ensuring smoother and more accurate conversion of DVD content to digital formats.
